channel.description: On Only the 80s we talk about what was cool in the 80s. The tv shows, movies, computers, tech, music, and all things 80s. This is a live show. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: SirGeorge
channel.itunes:subtitle: Only the 80s
